Posts.EditableText: Hello, I go by the name Dwellewd (or Dwell) and I am somewhat new to quest and decided to join the forums because of the great support / help I see people getting. I have made small games in quest, perhaps 10 to 15 rooms, in order to test things. I will stop rambling now and say hello to everyone , ~Dwellewd~
Posts.HTML:
Hello,

I go by the name Dwellewd (or Dwell) and I am somewhat new to quest and decided to join the forums because of the great support / help I see people getting. I have made small games in quest, perhaps 10 to 15 rooms, in order to test things. I will stop rambling now and say hello to everyone ,

Posts.EditableText: Welcome, to the community, hope you enjoy quest, and the community here. We're small but very helpful. Ask any questions you got, away!

Posts.EditableText:
Thanks Hegemonkhan.  Apologize for late reply, the forums says Views/4, Replies/0.

Aside from the tutorials, I have been reading through the help posts 1 by 1 since the last update or two, in order to get a decent ground base of familiar issues I may have as I trudge along.  

~Dwellewd~

Posts.EditableText:
Hi Dwell!

Can't say I'll be much help, but if you're a poor coder, like me, I might give you a little advice that's easier to use until you get a grasp of code.  Once you understand code, there is a stable of helpful horses that will be more beneficial to you.  

Good luck and happy gaming!

XanMag
